  • fine arts

Fine arts

The Studio Arts program offers an Associates of Fine Arts degree (AFA) which enables students to transfer credits to a four-year university. Besides participating in the AFA Graduate Exhibition in the Adminstration Building (1000) Art Gallery, students can network and keep up with the latest news and events on the AFA Facebook page.

University Transfer Degrees

  • Foundation studio art (AFA)
  • Photography (AFA)
